parameters.text:
=Moderate this content for policy violations:

Content: {{ $node["Content Submission"].json["body"]["content"] }}
Content Type: {{ $node["Content Submission"].json["body"]["type"] }}

Check for:
- Inappropriate language
- Spam
- Violence
- Hate speech
- Copyright issues

Provide JSON:
{
  "approved": "Yes/No",
  "violations": [],
  "confidence_score": "0-100",
  "severity": "Low/Medium/High",
  "action_required": "Approve/Flag/Remove/Ban User"
}
